title: Exploring Implicit Rules of Managed Learning: Technology-Supported Focus Group-Based Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of formal regulations and informal practices within organizations
context.additional_context: Specialized managed learning program for the language domain (communication/collaboration)

learning_goals: Participants can analyze implicit organizational rules and explain their correlation with formal rules
Participants can propose strategies to solve real-world cases using data collected from technology support focus groups
Participants can suggest improvements to implicit rules through structured scenario-based discussions
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
